quest: Hey Sword Cat? Could I get your help again?
Got most of my order, but I lost a ball or two. Could you get me {amount} {Color}?
accept: Thanks for your help. I'll do better next time!
decline: Ah, maybe they'll understand. It won't happen next time!
incomplete: I let the client know what's going on. Thanks again.
complete: Thanks! Maybe one day, it'll be me helping you with your orders.
